trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> At Hippothoe's side is a familiar creature.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the ailouros and follow her lead.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_TODO_01<tab>Subdue the dueling creatures.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the ailouros.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Hippothoe.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_000<tab>My, what a familiar essence you have! Like that of a familiar...if you're familiar with the concept?
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_001<tab>Oh, just my little joke. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, was it? I am Hippothoe.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_GEALCAT04288_000_002<tab>(-Ailouros-)Meeew. Mew!
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_003<tab>Yes, yes, we're getting to that. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, say “hello” to our familiar friend here. She's an ailouros.

TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_004<tab>The ailouroi are one of our newest creations, highly attuned to abnormalities in their environment. At the first sign of danger, they'll sound the alarum─by which I mean “mewl loudly.”

TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_005<tab>Though we do our best to observe all of our creations, Elpis is simply too large to maintain a constant vigil over each and every temperamental species. A more efficient means of detecting conflict between creatures was in order.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_006<tab>Thus have I taken this ailouros under my wing, to further develop her capabilities in this area. And she does enjoy our little walks.

TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_007<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((This evening)) ((This morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Today)) ((This evening)) /var>)) /var>, we are testing her ability to pinpoint sites of conflict. Would you like to observe?
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_008<tab>Simply tell her that her task is begun, and she'll do her utmost to locate disruptive creatures.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_009<tab>Please do subdue any unruly subjects once you've found them. We can't have beasts running amok!
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_020<tab>Never fear─she is quite proficient in our language. You need only let her know to begin.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_GEALCAT04288_000_025<tab>Mew?
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_GEALCAT04288_000_030<tab>Mew, mew!
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_SYTEM_000_031<tab>Follow the ailouros and try not to fall behind.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_035<tab>My ailouroi would never lead you astray─in theory, at least.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_GEALCAT04288_000_040<tab>Mrrr... Mew!!!
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_SYTEM_000_041<tab>The ailouros alerts you to two nearby creatures that are facing one another down, and looks at you expectantly.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_GEALCAT04288_000_050<tab>Mrrrp!
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_060<tab>She seems quite content, but in the name of science─what were the results?
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_061<tab>As I expected. Well done, little one!
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_062<tab>Magnificent creatures, the both of you. It's a shame we cannot give you a pair of tiny wings and a bell too, but it's against protocol, I'm afraid.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_063<tab>The ailouroi are enchanted with theirs at birth, so they are able to acclimate properly.
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_HIPPOTHOE_000_064<tab>I'm certain you have your own unique potential to rise to, however. In fact─why not join us for another phase of testing?
TEXT_AKTKZG013_04288_GEALCAT04288_000_070<tab>Mrrrp!
